qoute: And the Devil did grin, for his darling sin is pride that apes humility.
Conformity, humility, acceptance... with these coins we are to pay our fares to paradise.
Humility is born of the spirit, humiliation of the ego.
Humility is indeed beatness, a compulsory virtue that no one exhibits unless he has to.
Humility is no substitute for a good personality.
Humility is often a false front we employ to gain power over others.
Humility like the darkness, reveals the heavenly lights.
And the Devil did grin, for his darling sin is pride that apes humility.
Conformity, humility, acceptance... with these coins we are to pay our fares to paradise.
Humility is born of the spirit, humiliation of the ego.
Humility is indeed beatness, a compulsory virtue that no one exhibits unless he has to.
Humility is no substitute for a good personality.
Humility is often a false front we employ to gain power over others.
Humility like the darkness, reveals the heavenly lights.
If only I had a little humility, I'd be perfect.
It was pride that changed angels into devils; it is humility that makes men as angels.
Life is a long lesson in humility.
Pride makes us artificial and humility makes us real.
Pride perceiving humility honorable, often borrows her cloak.
Pride works frequently under a dense mask, and will often assume the garb of humility.
Real genius is nothing else but the supernatural virtue of humility in the domain of thought.
Steadfastness is a noble quality, but unguided by knowledge or humility it becomes rashness or obstinacy.
The greatest friend of Truth is time, her greatest enemy is Prejudice, and her constant companion Humility.
The greatest friend of truth is Time, her greatest enemy is Prejudice, and her constant companion is Humility.
The really tough thing about humility is you can't brag about it.
There is much proud humility and humble pride in the world.
There is no disease more conducive to clinical humility than aneurysm of the aorta.
There is no respect for others without humility in one's self.
They are proud in humility, proud that they are not proud.
True love is the parent of humility.
Vanity is a mark of humility rather than of pride.
We come nearest to the great when we are great in humility.
What the world needs is more geniuses with humility, there are so few of us left.
With disadvantages enough to bring him to humility, a Scotsman is one of the proudest things alive.
Without humility there can be no humanity.
